comment: RoseBear Available now <URL> Win the Best Boyfriend Award Get your girl a gift that will last a Lifetime ! Shop now and get Crazy Discounts ! ? <URL>
amr:
# ::snt RoseBear Available now <URL> Win the Best Boyfriend Award Get your girl a gift that will last a Lifetime ! Shop now and get Crazy Discounts ! ? <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / product
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "RoseBear")
            :ARG1-of (a / available-02
                  :time (n2 / now)))
      :snt2 (w / win-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a2 / award
                  :name n
                  :op1 "Best"
                  :op2 "Boyfriend"
                  :op3 "Award"))
      :snt3 (g / give-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (g2 / gift
                  :ARG1-of (l / last-03
                        :ARG2 (l2 / lifetime)))
            :ARG2 (g3 / girl
                  :poss y))
      :snt4 (a3 / and
            :op1 (s / shop-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :time (n3 / now))
            :op2 (g4 / get-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (d / discount
                        :mod (c / crazy)))
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown)))
